description: A React component named Badge that renders a styled span element with different color schemes based on the 'tone' prop. It is used as a UI primitive for displaying status badges with customizable appearance.

methods.name: Badge({ children, tone = 'info' })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a styled span element with color properties based on the 'tone' prop.
